name: Google Bangalore - Old Madras Road
address: Google Bangalore - Old Madras Road, No. 3, Old Madras Rd, Sadanandanagar, Bennigana Halli, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560016, India

detailed_reviews.review_text: Google s Googler s  Googly. Good company to be in. Had the privilege of visiting the office building as a parent. The staff seemed stress free, enjoying their life. Lots of food and entertainment for them. The food & entertainment is for the body, but only a googler would know what is his/her state of mind. Whis them all the BEST.

Amazing place, nice ambience and most motivating and inspiring place for all tech people. Loved the inspiring environment around here. Food Tastes good. Easily u can reach this office by Bayappanahalli metro station which is around 10 mins walk from this office. Sufficient parking space available and week maintained infrastructure. Overall great experience.
Its very good environment and place.. good place to work this place.dream company to work those who are working in information technology

The office was nice and comfortable. People are friendly. The security team was very helpful. I accidentally left my phone somewhere and they found it back. Its indeed one of the best companies to work for in the world.
I had been there for Google I/O 2022 event. What a campus and workplace. Very well organized. Id be happy to work in this place!

Google offices are famous for their really good environment and food for employees and this office is no exception. The office is decorated in a really cute way and the vibe here is really good. The food options in the cafe and micro kitchen are really amazing too.

Amazing place, nice ambience and most motivating and inspiring place for all tech people. Loved the inspiring environment around here. Food Tastes good. Easily u can reach this office by Bayappanahalli metro station which is around 10 mins walk from this office. Sufficient parking space available and week maintained infrastructure. Overall great experience.

Had been to this Google India s office to attend a technology meetup. The office is just few floors in the building but it is as amazing as anyone can expect from Google. We had gathered in one of the conference halls and later proceeded to the canteen area for some quick snacks at the end of the meetup.

Best IT COMPANY in India ever. I have visited Google Officr 3 times and its Bangalore office is outstanding. Its a really amazing olace for tech people. Best company for IT JOB Seekers. Google hosted an event at Bangalore for GDdIndia and it was a largest event hosted by Google in India. Google employees are always supportive anf ready to help in all ways.
If you get a job here it means you are truly blessed, everything that you can imagine is available here. This place is so cool and awesome.
This is one of the awesome places I have been to... enjoyed being there and no doubts about the ambience, the work place the people and the amenities, wow, simply superb..
Excellent workspace... Beautiful ambience... Wish I worked here
Oh this place is simply awesome. Was there for Applied CS with Android Facilitator Bootcamps. Office was amazing, food was good they offer free food. People who work there are also very friendly.
This complex hosts some of the well known companies like Google. Vast complex with good parking facility, and easy access.
Its a hevean to work in google iam a software developer  III in google AND its very honoured to be in such corporate              i love Google, #iam a gooogler  , I AM A GOOGLER

I am so happy to work and talk with Google assistant because the voice of AI=she/he gives me lots of information about the outside I want to learn some thing more about Google because I am a Computer science student i always try to research about Google... I am also preparing my selfs for giving interviews to get a job as Cyber security Engineer
Man... What an organization... Out of the box thinking... Home like environment... Practical and rational thinkers in the office... Googlers are the most privileged people on Earth.
Spacious campus with movie theatre styled meeting rooms. Delicious food,  overall nice ambience.
This is awesome place to work.... Working atmosphere very nice compare to other companies.I enjoyed  a lot from here....
It is a nice well connected place. The office interiors are very vibrant.
Amazing place. I wish i could someday work there.

I had meeting google office in RMZ infinity Building, First time i stepped in Google Office, good welcoming from the invitee, offered juice. The meeting went for a hour. I thought of asking questions on SEO & Google ADs, but didnt got a chance. Surely, if there are any openings, will join Google. Thank you.

It is an amazing place to work. The work life balance is amazing here. Google takes care of most of your stuffs. Work cultire is amazing. You will get a chance to work with some of the amazing people in the country. You will work with the best brains in India.
Kumiss valli & Yashoda RS - sales staff was very helpful
Is there azamat named employee work in this office please reply its important ?
Went to see the google office. But they dont allow strangers. The photo is what I got. :(
Best place to work in India! Unbelievable facilities for the employees! Awesome food that exceeds even the best restaurants around Bangalore and the best part being its free!
Nice place to search for things(Good things)
Amazing Place to work and Co-workers are too good who are supporting one more thing is Googles cafeteria also amazing
Greater place than Mumbai Maharashtra office....
Well planned and good thought out building by RMZ. Close to Gopalan Mall More. Shopping mall and other renowned place. Closest possible place to Byappanhalli Metro station.
Great place great ambiance everyone like to work here

Definitely a great place to work at. The office was a little smaller than I had imagined. The highlight of the office was definitely the buffet section. Google offices across the world are known for their amazing chefs and food. It houses the best coders after all. The office is on RMZ Infinity complex and requires quite a walk to reach though.

One of the best office ever! Got a chance to be here for a Google Adword Product class and felt each second to be in a real special space. The place has very tight security and is full of latest equipments. Loved the class room and ambience. Everything was really special here. The employees are really cool and friendly.
One on the best place Ive ever gone to!
I had been here for a youtube event and its a wonderful place, lovely staff and super fast internet even for guest Wi-Fi
Perfect work culture and its amazing i went to community meet , way of treating and manner to outsiders is perfect , extremely happy, cafe and there food court its awesome
The design and decor has more of a personality than the office in Bagmane Constellation Park (Carina). The recreation area is also superior, in my opinion.

Was here for a meet on neighborly. Nice team, people, and Google has a good amazing culture and guests and visitors have no embarrassing moments like they have in other mncs in terms of access of common utilities. Cafeteria is a amazing place to spend a peaceful hour with great food choice.
Completely a different world experience visiting google. Like this place alot. Must visit place.

Amazing Place! Its a tech park by RMZ Group. There are other companies too in the same campus. Coming to the point , Google campus here is beautiful. I had an opportunity to visit the campus. You will never see a campus like a Google campus. The hype about Google campuses is not just a hype. The hype lives up to the expectation. If this review was helpful please leave a like. Thanks.
The office is pretty good.. desks and other arrangements are nicelyanaged.. multiple cafes are there with tons of options

We went to the 4th floor reception and 5th floor. Unusual decor, very colourful. Fully equipped conference room with video recording facility and control on the moderators laptop. A full blown cricket net in the play area inside the office. Good security controls. Lots of parking space. Big and high lift lobbies. Fully wheel chair compatible. Security accessible over phone through main entrance visitors area.
Google workspace: Domain registered. Gsuit part of subscription. Google cloud: Quick response for billing quota. Hosting: Cloud or Sites, information of hosting is not clear. Payments: No hassle.
I am 15 and my dream is to join Google and I will
Its too crowded place
Splendid experience at Google India Bengaluru office located at RMZ Infinity

Just I know there is a GOOGLE office at Bengaluru through GOOGLE Maps by locating H Q.I imagine that the office is at CALIFORNIA only.As A LocalGuide applied for CONNECT LIVE 2020 explored this fact and wish to visit this office full of people with more skills and intelligence .Hope to visit office if permission granted. .

We had been to google publishers meet in this office. Mr Ajay Luther took sessions. He spoke about right usage of Google ad sense , Google analytics and importance of implementing AMP to enhance user experience. We also got insights into the importance of regional content building to reach more people. The hospitality and learning in Google was great and worth remembering.

Google is super mnc which gives more benefits to his and her employees and it will recruit the persons  who are the equivalent knowledge than the experienced candidates. If the person had no academics records and but he is skillful then he is selected. If u want to join google u have to create resume unique with our core skills dont copy from anywhere. All the best.  I am also trying to be a part of this company let see what happens
I was there for an interns event and it was really fun. The ambience and food was amazing. It must be a great place to work as the employees were very open to interact. Hope Ill be back there soon!

This is the place for the computer lovers in the India. I appreciate the whole team of the Google, works really hard for us to make the service good for us, Google works really hard for us to make us safe from hackers and to provide the best service for us we all should obey rules of Google, Google call for us we should also appreciate their hard work. We all should appreciate, obey, respect, follow the rules as well as terms and conditions of the Google. Thank you team Google, for all of your help and support for us.
Ha ha.. Write a review for Google. Well the ambience is really cool. Good workplace as the have pool table as well. But yes. No photos are allowed to be taken

I would say, excellent working environment, great Organization to work with, talented young minds,good infrastructure, ideal location and above an employer who believe in safety and well-being. Thank you #PerfectHostAngeline Thanks Google! #IamNeighbourly #letsguide #Google #googlelocalguide  Google! Companion in Our Life.
The office is amazing. Theres every possible thing one can hope to have in a work place. The cafeteria is great and an awesome game room.
Nice company 2 years jop experience
Its a great place with so much of talent and humble

The office itself is attractive and located in a beautiful building, but if you expect customer service from this company it is almost equal to zero. If Google requires anything from you theY ARE always accessible, but if you need anything from Google it is almost like a Fortress; there is absolutely and virtually no option to get to them. Its all MAYA.
The securities and employees that I met were really helpful.
Excellent office space,  Amazing work location, ambiance, people around. Last but not least..! Food court... No words, You get the best food compared to all corporate companies.!!

Amazing premises and workspace. Fallen in love with the food provided in here. It will give a run for money for any popular buffet though ironically its free. Office spreads across 4th and 5th floor of E block.
Best work place I have seen till now. Have everything to chill out and code seriously. You can get anything you want : help or food. Both available always.

The Google India Bangalore campus was really a good place to explore. As part of a program I have got opputunity to visit the google and every location to which we had been was pleasant and nice to explore but the photos are strictly prohibited in the site/place. I would finally thank google India for giving me this golden opportunity to visit their quarters.
World-class.... environment.
Frequent meetups conducted here.Great networking spot

Wow, Google is a feeling. You can play indoor cricket, foosball, TT, pool, PS, Chess. You can eat free food with varieties of cornetto ice-cream, juices, fruits, salads, veg, non-veg along with provision of ordering food from live counter as Well. Everyone is polite, cheerful and Genius ofcourse in their domain.
One Day!

Unlike other tech parks, the internal roads are wider. Goes without saying the Google office is great inside. The office is kinda low key. Nothing flashy like some other Google offices. This is just a small office of Google.

Really great place for tech people . i visit there for meeting with googler , nice design but there restriction more then USA office , there not allow take picture in side . start from 3rd floor but guest visitor center in 4th floor .
Am here for the open data camp, and I must confess this is nothing less than a 5-star hotel ambience plus the peaceful atmosphere. Staff are so cooperative and proactive in handling guest queries.

Most popular search engine is our Google.It is very important to search any information or place or anything..This time I always use Google for my works.It is very Helpful to me & everyone. This Google team also working very well.Google is present all over the world with their users..I like always Googles work.It is a Good Team.Thank you Google for your helpful things.

Everyone is interested to be a part of Google company. It is a dream company for millions of people. Corporate atmosphere is really best compared to other companies. Its vision to help billions of people of  each and every corner of the world

Located on Old Madras Road, an amazing campus but stay clear from the traffic around it from both sides (ie, KR Pura side as well as Bypanahalli side as well). If you get stuck in that traffic then forget about your plans for the day. Generally its moving traffic and thats fine. But if it gets jammed then youll be there for a long time.
One of the best office complex ever I have visited in India. Every possible facility available inside the campus. Apart from that work environment is so cool.
As usual ,Always on top of All with respect to  Ambience,Work Environment, Entertainment,and everything,not feels like in the Typical office premises.Gives a very unique feel, Always.
Google office in India. Very well kept office space with all the modern facilities you can think of. Note the indoor Rugby training filed with an automatic pitcher robot.

Google Bangalore office is one of its kind. Located in one of the Technology Parks, it has got easy access to Bay area, Gopalan Shopping Complex, Residential area and Bangalore Metro. Food is amazing and beats any other 5 Star restaurant quality. As a Google Developer Group (GDG) Bangalore organizer, weve conducted a lots of Developer focused events at this office space.
First time at a Google office. Got in because of my friend. The office environment is far greater than what I thought. Looking forward to seeing the real office in near future
It deserves more than 5 stars. I recently got the opportunity to be at Google India office. The food was amazing. Overall, everything was perfect.
I have attended a masterclass here, taking photo is restricted. they providr good knowledge as well as tasty food. wonderful experience i had.
I wish I get an opportunity to work here!! Google has become the most valuable brand in the world and one of the ways one sees it the way they have planned their office spaces!!
the best office i have ever seen in my life,worked for them for one day and it was pleasure working for them.they speak so gently ,that anyone would love to work with them
Google India, Bangalore is really awesome. Working environment, people (staff) l, food, was perfect. It motivates to work there. It was really a nice experience.
lovely place for software engineers

Nice place to jion for jobs and it is toughtest to get the job there are many play things to relaxe for employs and good salary packed  and it almost works like a # goverment it is best place its heatquater is at california
Excellent experience and the office is totally awesome. I liked the work life balance of google and they pay really well

Google Tez payment solution overrule all the payment system. I wonder how google tez transferring money without NEFT charges. Its amazing to use and transfer money with fee. Its great move from google. Google will buy phonepe very soon. Also I earned some good money by using Tez App.
Good place to learn new things and explore ppl
Internet giant Google in East Bangalore. Great environment, rich experience. They offer free food, snacks to employees. Everyone wish to work here.

Thanking for your tribute paid to our beloved icon of karnataka-India DR. RAJKUMAR we welcome for your work and love for our language KANNADA we look forward for the same support as well we. LOVE U GOOGLE>
HI i am Bangladeshi My company name Bd Enterprse i open to google business page my page verification is pending Dear Sir Please help me My page successfully verification you have to do work.
Good building, nice parking lot, but they charge for parking even though you visit Google for official purpose, clean building, good cafeteria
One of the best working place. Very nicely maintained office with high security measures. Lots of colors.
Went there for a data science meet, the place, the people, its awesome. Free goodies to top it off. Enjoyed the session !
Damn. This is a really cool place to work at. Awesome infrastructure and the food they serve at lunch is just too good.
Awesome place. Heaven for techies.
Id been here for the IO extended event. Beautiful place with great amenities. Id imagine its a great place to work at.

Google India. ... Indian Internet Users using Google as main Search Engine which could reach over 80% of the total search. However, India is one of the main marketplaces for Google for their products including major products such as Adwords and Adsense.
Want to see heaven. Just see this place and youre done.
Very nice work in Google
